verbs.description: Hours after [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: tweeted] [ARG1: his opposition to Rep. Mark Sanford ( R - SC )] , voters in his Charleston - based district tossed the former South Carolina Governor out of his seat in the U.S ....
